description:
Wearing a couple of trail-ready T-rexes, these wool socks will keep your little archaeologist’s feet comfy during long days at the dig, or campground. Made of a naturally antimicrobial merino wool blend that dries quickly, wears well, and shines on the trail.

  • Made of merino wool, nylon, and Lycra
  • Targeted cushioning underfoot, atop the ankle, and up the Achilles providing comfort without bulk
  • Lightweight wool yarn in a ribbed performance knit with seamless construction ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters
  • Rises about 15cm above the base of the heel and shows 10cm above your average shoes, or just above the cuff of hiking boots
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough TR Ranger Saurus Micro Crew Junior Socks
